Project1.title: Pet Adoption
Project1.description: In this project, I created a mock pet adoption site where the user can narrow down what type of pet they are looking for.
Project1.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github

Project2.title: Bear Watcher
Project2.description: Ever poke around the web for bear pictures? Well, put them all in one place...and you get to name them.
Project2.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Webpack, Version Control with Github

Project3.title: Trash Tracker
Project3.description: My front-end capstone built to educate and encourage better decisions concerning things we choose to throw away or recycle.
Project3.technologiesUsed: HTML, SCSS, React, React Router, Version Control with Github

Project4.title: Mushroom Picker
Project4.description: Press your luck picking random mushrooms in my first React project. How many can you collect?
Project4.technologiesUsed: HTML, SCSS, React, Version Control with Github

Project5.title: Tamagotchi
Project5.description: Remember tamagotchis? I made a simplified version where you can influence stats, like health and energy.
Project5.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Webpack, Version Control with Github
